meanings.definition: To examine thoroughly and make necessary repairs or adjustments.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic overhauled the engine to fix the problem.
meanings.sent2: The team overhauled their strategy for the upcoming game.
meanings.sent3: She overhauled her messy room before her friends came over.
meanings.sent4: The company overhauled its outdated website to attract more customers.
meanings.sent5: The chef overhauled the recipe to make it healthier and tastier.

meanings.sent1: The school overhauled the playground to make it safer for the children.
meanings.sent2: They overhauled the old house and turned it into a beautiful bed and breakfast.
meanings.sent3: The magician overhauled his magic show with new tricks and illusions.
meanings.sent4: The artist overhauled her painting with vibrant colors and bold strokes.
meanings.sent5: The coach overhauled the team's training program to enhance their performance.

meanings.definition: To completely change or replace something.
meanings.sent1: The company overhauled its logo to give it a fresh look.
meanings.sent2: The government overhauled the tax system to make it more efficient.
meanings.sent3: He overhauled his wardrobe with new clothes for the new season.
meanings.sent4: The city overhauled its public transportation system to reduce traffic.
meanings.sent5: She overhauled her study routine to improve her grades.
